title: In case of revised permission, wherever third party interest is created by way of registered agreement to sale or lease etc
clause_text: In case of revised permission, wherever third party interest is created by way of registered agreement to sale or lease etc. of the apartment, consent of such interested party / persons as specified under RERA Act shall be submitted.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
